name: Max Verstappen
bio: Youngest Formula 1 World Champion at 24. Known for his aggressive racing style and exceptional car control. Trains 6-8 hours daily combining physical fitness with advanced simulator work.

name: Lewis Hamilton
bio: Seven-time World Champion and one of the greatest drivers in F1 history. Maintains peak performance through strict vegan diet and innovative training methods including meditation and yoga.

name: Charles Leclerc
bio: Ferrari's rising star from Monaco. Known for his exceptional qualifying pace and smooth driving style. Combines classical piano training with racing to enhance his concentration and precision.

name: Lando Norris
bio: McLaren's young talent known for his adaptability and technical feedback. Maintains peak fitness through cycling, gaming for reaction times, and mental conditioning exercises.
